extension.name: Content - Newsletter Subscriber
extension.author: Christopher Mavros
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Christopher Mavros. All rights reserved.
extension.description:
A simple subscription plugin. Sends an email to the recipient with user's submitted data and saves them in a text file.
For a more professional solution, please see NS Pro.

field.name: email_recipient
field.label: Notification Recipient
field.description: The recipient of the subscription notification mail.

field.name: subject
field.label: Notification Subject
field.description: The subject on the mail sent to the recipient containing the name and the email of the user.

field.name: from_name
field.label: Notification Mail From Name
field.description: The name of the subscription mail's sender

field.name: from_email
field.label: Notification Mail From Email
field.description: The email of the subscription mail's sender

field.name: sending_from_set
field.label: Sending from set email
field.description: If this is yes, the mail sent comes from the set email above. If it is no, it comes from the data given while subscribing

field.name: unique_id
field.label: Unique Identifier
field.description: If you want to use NS multiple times in a page, use this unique identifier so that they don't get post together.

field.name: name_placeholder
field.label: Name Placeholder
field.description: The placeholder of the name input.

field.name: email_placeholder
field.label: Email Placeholder
field.description: The placeholder of the email input.

field.name: button_text
field.label: Button Text
field.description: The text on the submit button

field.name: page_text
field.default: Thank you for subscribing to our site.
field.label: Thank you text
field.description: The text displayed to the user when he subscribes

field.name: error_text
field.default: Your subscription could not be submitted. Please try again.
field.label: Error page text
field.description: The text displayed to the user when the subscription fails to be mailed

field.name: no_name
field.label: No Name Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user does not write a name

field.name: no_email
field.label: No Email Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user does not write an email

field.name: invalid_email
field.label: Invalid Email Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user writes an invalid email

field.name: pre_text
field.label: Small Intro Text
field.description: A small text shown before (above) the subscription form

field.name: name_width
field.label: Name Width
field.description: Width in letters of the name input

field.name: email_width
field.label: Email Width
field.description: Width in letters of the email input

field.name: thank_text_color
field.label: Text Color
field.description: The color of the Thank you text.

field.name: error_text_color
field.label: Error Text Color
field.description: The color of the error texts.

field.name: save_list
field.label: Save to List
field.description: If this is yes, then every subscription is written to a file in 'email' format. (This does not influent sending the email)

field.name: save_path
field.label: List File Full Path
field.description: Full path of list file. Please make sure all directories exist up to the file.

field.name: nsproad
field.label:
Reach your audience professionally!

NS Pro is a professional newsletter Joomla! extension, including a wide variety of features, while maintaining the ability to be used as anything from a simple sign-up form, to a complete newsletter system including newsletter campaigns, multiple mailing lists, personalized newsletters, automatic bounce handling, etc.

  • Unlimited Mailing Lists, Subscribers, Newsletters
  • Full featured Mailing List Manager, Subscriber Manager, Newsletter Manager, Front-end Newsletter Manager
  • Ajax Subscribe Form, Ajax Unsubscribe Form, with flexible, responsive layout
  • Custom Fields for the Subscribe Form, including hidden fields for IP and other visitor details.
  • Optional Double Opt-In, Opt-Out with customizable confirmation emails
  • Guaranteed No Duplicate Subscribers
  • Subscriber Statistics, Newsletter Opening Statistics
  • Flexible Subscriber Import (text, CSV)
  • Guaranteed Newsletter Sending
  • Newsletter Sending Customizations: Newsletter throttling, Selective Sending, Time Delay
  • Newsletter Scheduling: Automatic Sending based on date-time or events, After Subscription Campaigns
  • Newsletter Sending Test Tool
  • Article Imports, Module Imports, Personalized Details in Newsletters
  • Bounced Email Check
  • Unlimited Websites License

NS Pro can be installed, configured and used by anyone with a minimum knowledge of Joomla! Moreover, NS Pro includes all the professional features required, for the more experienced users, to spread their online content, automatically maintain clean subscriber lists, schedule newsletters based on a specific date or specific events, like after subscription, and also customize any visible text in any language with minimum effort. With a 30-day money-back guarantee, why not choose it to take your Newsletters to the next level?
